title: Build Sign In Page with Wallet Connection & SIWE
Build Protected Dashboard with Content Table
description:
## Overview
Create a protected dashboard route with authentication checks and content management functionality.

## Requirements

### Authentication & Routing
- Create protected /dashboard route
- Implement session check via better-auth
- If not authenticated → redirect to /signin
- If authenticated → show dashboard content

### Dashboard UI Components
- Content list displayed in table format with the following columns:
  - Content Title
  - Content Preview
  - Actions (Edit + Delete buttons)
- "Create Content" button that navigates to /dashboard/content/{new-id}

### Technical Requirements
- Use shadcn/ui components for all UI elements
- All API calls must use TanStack Query
- Follow the project architecture guidelines

## References
- /docs/knowledge-base.md - Contains LLM documentation sources and key rules
- /docs/adr/0001-project-architecture.md - Project architecture decisions

## Key Architecture Decisions to Follow
1. API Layer: All API calls must use TanStack Query, organized in dedicated folder structure
2. UI Components: Use shadcn/ui components exclusively - no custom color definitions
3. Authentication: Use better-auth for session management

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Protected /dashboard route created
- [ ] Session check implemented with better-auth
- [ ] Redirect to /signin for unauthenticated users
- [ ] Dashboard displays content table with Title, Preview, and Actions columns
- [ ] Create Content button navigates to /dashboard/content/{new-id}
- [ ] All UI components use shadcn/ui
- [ ] All API calls use TanStack Query

title: Build OneZap Landing Page with Hero Section
description:
Build a landing page for the OneZap platform with the following requirements:

## Requirements
- Create landing page at / route
- Hero section introducing OneZap platform
- Explain "Lossless Subscription" value proposition
- "Get Started" CTA button → navigates to /dashboard
- Use shadcn/ui components exclusively
- Ensure responsive design

## Architecture Guidelines
Reference /docs/knowledge-base.md and /docs/adr/0001-project-architecture.md for implementation guidelines:
- Use shadcn/ui components exclusively (no custom color definitions)
- Follow the UI component strategy from ADR 0001
- Ensure consistent design system with Tailwind CSS integration

## Expected Deliverables
- Landing page component with hero section
- Responsive design for mobile and desktop
- Navigation functionality to /dashboard
- Clear value proposition messaging for Lossless Subscription
